nodes.text: The Voice Will Be With You, Always

The Voice Will Be With You, Always is an interview of James Arnold Taylor conducted by Scott Chernoff and published in Star Wars Insider 112. In the article, Taylor discusses his history as and inspiration for being a voice actor, the role of Obi-Wan Kenobi in the new Clone Wars TV series, how big of a Star Wars fan he is, and how he developed the voices for Kenobi and Plo Koon.
